post.title: Dare on C-Omega
post.content: I just read Dare’s awesome article on C-Omega. If I had any time at all, I’d experiment with it to rewrite dasBlog (well, at least the back end parts of dasBlog anyway). Of course, I don’t have any time at all, so it’s not going to happen (well, at least I won’t make it happen)
post.excerpt: I just read Dare’s awesome article on C-Omega. If I had any time at all, I’d experiment with it to rewrite dasBlog (well, at least the back end parts of dasBlog anyway). Of course, I don’t have any time at all, so it’s not going to happen (well, at least I won’t make it happen)
